snippet: Algeria came from behind to beat South Africa, 3-1, at the Africa Cup of Nations in Mongomo, Equatorial Guinea.
abstract: Algeria defeats South Africa, 3-1, at Africa Cup of Nations in Mongomo, Equatorial Guinea; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Algeria came from behind to beat South Africa, 3-1, at the Africa Cup of Nations in Mongomo, Equatorial Guinea.

headline.main: Algeria Avoids an Upset at Africa Cup of Nations
